channel.title: Please help

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“ownageownt, post:6, topic:183096”]Actually, my way is the correct way. You need to tone this down lol.

if delete that -----> ((command.startsWith("adminzone")) <----- delete that && (playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage "Your in Admin zone!"; }

Therefore, it should look like this

if (command.startsWith("adminzone") && playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage("Your in Admin zone!"); }

Also close sendMessage with parenthesis.[/quote]thanks i got it right but where it said (“adminzone”)) u need to talk away the second ) lol and how do i make monsters drop items i went in to npcdrop i added it and it wont go in they wont drop items

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Actually, my way is the correct way. You need to tone this down lol.

if delete that -----> ((command.startsWith("adminzone")) <----- delete that && (playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage "Your in Admin zone!"; }

Therefore, it should look like this

if (command.startsWith("adminzone") && playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage("Your in Admin zone!"); }

Also close sendMessage with parenthesis.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

put this in:

if ((command.startsWith("adminzone")) && (playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage "Your in Admin zone!"; }

that should solve it

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Yeah lol. It was my fault for not proof reading your command. Here is the real one.

if (command.startsWith("adminzone") && playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 3659; teleportToY = 3552; sendMessage("Your in Admin zone!"); }

Sorry.

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

ok i have been trying to port forward well i got my no-ip done but when i try the “ipconfig” i get this

it has set me back alot and it is making me mad because now people can’t get on my server and it is running for no reason please help me thanks

and i am using a project Caesar i want to add the ::adminzone i got this

if (command.startsWith(“adminzone”) && playerRights >= 2)
teleportToX = 3659;
teleportToY = 3552;
sendMessage “Your in Admin zone!”;
}

but it goes in client.java right please help!

Read full topic
